amendment.description: Amendment sought to increase funding for the U.S. Army Corps of Engineers' general investigations account by $2 million.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in the Congressional Record to increase by $2 million the funding for the Army Corps of Engineers General Investigating Account. An equal amount is deducted from the account for the Corps' General Expenses account as an offset.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hulshof amendment (A001) Failed by recorded vote: 165 - 262 (Roll no. 334).
